item.description: AWS Client VPN #aws #cloud #networking #vpn AWS Client VPN is a fully-managed remote access VPN solution provided by AWS to be used by your remote workforce to securely access resources within both AWS and your on-premises network.
AWS VPN CloudHub #aws #cloud #networking #vpn An architectural pattern recommended by AWS, To create AWS Site-to-Site VPNs across multiple customer offices/data centes.
